home.elevatorPitch: Improve your language skills and connect with others through journaling.
home.reasonOneText: Writing is such a powerful tool for improving your language skills, but it takes effort and is best when you can get feedback. Journaly is a home for your writing and great feedback from fellow language learners!
home.reasonTwoText: There are many personal benefits to keeping a journal, and it is one of the most desired positive habits for many people. Journaly supercharges your language learning while helping you get all the benefits of keeping a journal!
home.reasonThreeText: Many sites help you find a language exchange partner by simply matching your language interests - but thatâ€™s not good enough for us. Journaly helps you find people who also share the same interests as you!

ALPHA_USER.title: Alpha User
ALPHA_USER.description: Participated in the Journaly Alpha test. We've come a long way since then, but this user was on the front lines helping catch early bugs and shape Journally since the beginning!

BETA_USER.title: Beta User
BETA_USER.description: Participated in the Journaly Beta test. The hero Journaly needs.

CODE_CONTRIBUTOR.title: Code Contributor
CODE_CONTRIBUTOR.description: Has contributed code to the Journaly codebase. You can find the Journaly source code, and contribute yourself, at https://github.com/Journaly/journaly

TEN_POSTS.title: 10 Posts
TEN_POSTS.description: Published 10 posts. Really starting to get going now!

ONEHUNDRED_POSTS.title: 100 Posts
ONEHUNDRED_POSTS.description: Published 100 posts. Talk about sticking with it!

imageErrors.allDoneChecksFailed: An error occured while uploading your image. Please try again later.
